knimeNode.name: Pivot
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts information present in rows to columns.

fullDescription.intro: Converts information present in rows to columns
fullDescription.option: Values from these columns will become the parts of the columns in the result table (no columns with these names will be present).
The format of the new columns (${} - values, ${pivot column name} values of that nominal column).

What to do if there will be missing parts in the result:
fillEmpty - put empty cells there
signalError - stop the conversion with error.
The values of these columns will add a part to the new columns to the place of ${}.
These will remain in the results.

ports.inPort: A table with known domains for the keys and pivoting columns.
ports.outPort: The table with information transformed to the columns.
An indicator of the pushed variable
